Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Bryn Mawr, Pulaski, Peterson and Kimball: due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Bryn Mawr, Pulaski, Peterson and Kimball: due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr.

Allow extra travel time.
